data.name: RPG Maker MV - Wizard Castle Inner Tiles
data.detailed_description:
There's nothing more magical or mysterious than the inner workings of a wizard's castle! Journey through the mystical halls and explore bookshelves crammed with enchanted tomes and spellbinding scrolls.

Created by Sherman3D, Wizard Castle Inner Tiles is a fun-sized pack featuring the classic medieval wizard castle. From wizard hats to flying brooms, this pack includes fun details to give your wizard castle some personality and charm. Whether you're looking to make your game more magical, or simply wish for a greater variety of tiles, Wizard Castle Inner Tiles is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker MV resources.

Features:
  • Partial Tiles A2 and A4, with recolors - including a variety of walls and floors.
  • Full Tile B, including furniture and essentials.
  • Animated double-door character set with variations.
  • Created and optimized for RPG Maker MV.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
